changelog.title: The Factionless
changelog.description: Some cannot be contained by a single path. The algorithm watches for those who refuse to choose.

changelog.title: Glitch Aesthetic
changelog.description: Those who walk between worlds see reality differently. The system strains to render them.

changelog.title: All Doors Open
changelog.description: Boundaries exist for those who accept them. The Factionless recognize no walls.

changelog.title: Storm the Gates
changelog.description: The Factionless have discovered alternate paths into forbidden territories.
